data.comment: The big names in today's match at Mandemakers Stadion have now been confirmed.
The match has started at Mandemakers Stadion.
In the minute 39, Waalwijk's Vitalie Damascan has been booked in Waalwijk.
Rob Dieperink blows to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Mandemakers Stadion.
In the minute 46, Lennerd Daneels is replacing Cyril Ngonge for the home team.
Jurien Gaari (Waalwijk) gets a yellow card.
John Stegeman (Zwolle) is making a first substitution, with Slobodan Tedic replacing Reza Ghoochannejhad.
In the minute 62, John Stegeman is making the team's second substitution at Mandemakers Stadion with Eliano Reijnders replacing Jesper Drost.
Eliano Reijnders is on target to give Zwolle a 0-1 advantage.
Slobodan Tedic instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 72, Richard van der Venne is replacing Nicolas Olsak for Waalwijk at Mandemakers Stadion.
The home team replace Vitalie Damascan with Morad el Haddouti.
Rico Strieder is on a sub for Mustafa Saymak for Zwolle.
In the minute 75, Zwolle make their fourth substitution with Mike Van Duinen replacing Clint Leemans.
The home team have replaced Anas Tahiri with Finn Stokkers. This is the fourth substitution made today by Fred Grim.
The home team replace Sylla Sow with Ola John.
In the minute 84, At Mandemakers Stadion, Mike Van Duinen has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through a header from Finn Stokkers.
Great play from Lennerd Daneels to set up the goal.
In the minute 89, Destan Bajselmani (Zwolle) has received a yellow card from Rob Dieperink.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
John Stegeman (Zwolle) has taken off Destan Bajselmani who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Pelle Clement is the replacement.
